analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x097a0820574a8dfb8035c15d829dc25187fc4129.sol:
	Contract HalfToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x097a0820574a8dfb8035c15d829dc25187fc4129.sol#222-232)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x097a0820574a8dfb8035c15d829dc25187fc4129.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/5/0x097a0820574a8dfb8035c15d829dc25187fc4129.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0x097a0820574a8dfb8035c15d829dc25187fc4129.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
